name: One Bullet (Gurin)
description:
My submission for the EGD Quarantine Jam 2.0 !

The rules are simple... not:

* Each player starts with 5 bullets.

* Whoever runs out of HP loses the game.

* If a player has 1 HP left, they will have a shield that protects them from bullets.

* If the other player has one bullet left in their gun, the shield protection will be gone (Until the enemy player has more/less bullets than 1), meaning that if a player has 2 bullets left, and they shoot one of them at their enemy, their enemy will die since the first player now has 1 bullet left in the gun.

* If a player lands shots on the other player while they're using the shield, their max ammo count will increase by 1 (for a max of 10 bullets).

Controls: 

Note: WORKS ONLY WITH CONTROLLERS.

Move with left stick, aim with right stick, shoot with R1. (On XBox/PC controller)
